channel.title: Comments on: Thank a Colleague Award – Susan Boone

item.title: By: Shauna Hannibal
item.dc:creator: Shauna Hannibal
item.description: It's great for us in Access Services that Susan continues to help out on a regular basis at the Service Desk! I'm not sure how long she's been doing so but I know it's been for the past several years.
item.content:encoded: It’s great for us in Access Services that Susan continues to help out on a regular basis at the Service Desk! I’m not sure how long she’s been doing so but I know it’s been for the past several years.

item.title: By: Charles Macquarie
item.dc:creator: Charles Macquarie
item.description: Calm, Cool, and Collected: the Susan Boone story. Kudos Susan!
item.content:encoded: Calm, Cool, and Collected: the Susan Boone story. Kudos Susan!

item.title: By: Andres Panado
item.dc:creator: Andres Panado
item.description: Susan - what else can I say? I am so, so, so happy that you were here to help us here at Access Services at last minute. It was definitely a crazy morning that day, but your willingness to help out another unit is definitely appreciated and is exemplary of what this library is all about. Did I already say I was happy? :-)
item.content:encoded: Susan – what else can I say? I am so, so, so happy that you were here to help us here at Access Services at last minute. It was definitely a crazy morning that day, but your willingness to help out another unit is definitely appreciated and is exemplary of what this library is all about. Did I already say I was happy? ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Sarah McClung
item.dc:creator: Sarah McClung
item.description: Great job, Susan! Always a joy to work with you.
item.content:encoded: Great job, Susan! Always a joy to work with you.
